content.text:
[@dan](@NeB4q4Hy9IiMxs5L08oevEhivxW+/aDu/s/0SkNayi0=.ed25519) 

Are there any simple rules that we might be able to use to fix this before #sameas ( #same-as ) is implemented for channels? Hyphens seem relatively simple: when someone searches #foo-bar it should return results for #foobar *and* #foo-bar. Plurality is a bit more complicated, but still seems possible.
